package.name: StructureTools2
package.description: This is a workbench for FreeCAD that implements a set of tools for modeling and analyzing structural stresses, similar to analysis software such as SAP2000, Cype3D, SkyCiv, EdiLus, among many others.

workbench.name: StructureTools Workbench
workbench.description: This is a workbench for FreeCAD that implements a set of tools for modeling and analyzing structural stresses, similar to analysis software such as SAP2000, Cype3D, SkyCiv, EdiLus, among many others.
